title: Creating a Ranked Team. Silver - Gold
body:
Looking for people to join my ranked team, 
I am Gold II currently,
I would prefer you to be online often, 
looking for any role, 
will accept anyone ranked between anywhere in silver and gold.

Add me or comment if you are interested. 
:3

replies.body: I know I'm going to get flamed for this but I'm fluctuating between B3 and B5 for inconsistency. I'm looking for a consistent group to play with. I'm really committed to the game so will take on any advice I can get and would love to play with you guys. I main ADC, almost never go negative and feel like I get a pretty high level of CS (60-70) @ 10 min. I've encountered heaps of issues with people trolling support if at all. Give me a shot ;) IGN: Maya Hirasedo

Silver 3 ADC/Supp here. My IGN: Musicas

Online pretty much every day

I'm Gold 4 in NA
moved to OCE, currently Silver 1.
Can fill any role, best with supp/mid.
IGN: Juicy Cupcake
gold 3 mid main, ign Play Heaps

silver 5 but play alot better in a team situation, can play any posi but top and adc would have to be my best.

IGN: froggy6666
Do you guys accept diamond V?

Hey there I was gold last two seasons, have taken a huge break (6-7 months) and now have returned ready to play for realz again. I main top lane but can play all roles except ADC. I have a large top lane champ pool, medium sized pools for both mid/jg. I am available most arvo's most days so pretty flexible. I am still getting back into LoL and learning all the changes that are made still so I just wanna have chill games where we have fun really add me if interested.

IGN: Lexhanatin
Rank: Silver 3
Role: Adc>Support>Mid>Jungle

Sent you a friend request.
